mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS dy') FROM DUAL

SELECT STUDENT_NUM, MEMO, ID, TITLE, ALLDAY, START_TIME AS "START", END_TIME AS "END", URL_STR AS "URL", CLASSNAME, EDITABLE, STARTEDITABLE, DURATIONEDITABLE, RESOURCEEDITABLE, RENDERING, OVERLAP, CONSTRAINT_EVENT AS "CONSTRAINT", SOURCE_EVENT AS "SOURCE", BACKGROUNDCOLOR, BORDERCOLOR, TEXTCOLOR, REFERENCE FROM EVENT WHERE STUDENT_NUM = #{student_num} OR CONSTRAINT_EVENT != 0 ORDER BY START_TIME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT VALUES ( #{student_num}, #{memo}, 'EV'||EV_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, 1, 0, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_TIMESTAMP(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), null, null, #{className}, 1, 1, 1, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, #{constraint}, null, #{backgroundColor}, null, null, null #{reference} )
mapper.update: UPDATE EVENT SET ( MEMO, TITLE, ALLDAY, START_TIME, END_TIME, URL_STR, CLASSNAME, EDITABLE, STARTEDITABLE, DURATIONEDITABLE, RESOURCEEDITABLE, RENDERING, OVERLAP, CONSTRAINT_EVENT, SOURCE_EVENT, BACKGROUNDCOLOR, BORDERCOLOR, TEXTCOLOR, REFERENCE ) = ( SELECT #{memo}, #{title}, 1, 0, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_TIMESTAMP(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), null, null, #{className}, 1, 1, 1, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, #{constraint}, null, #{backgroundColor}, null, null, null #{reference} FROM DUAL ) WHERE ID = #{id} AND STUDENT_NUM = #{student_num}
mapper.delete: DELETE EVENT WHERE ID = #{id} AND STUDENT_NUM = #{student_num}
